FuncDef: The reset mbusnode command is used to reset the corresponding mbusnode according to the slot number.

ParaDef.Info:
Slot number, according to the different hardware devices have different values.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When you need to reset the corresponding mbusnode according to the slot number, you can run this command.
